definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia

sentences.english: On cloudy days, use the camera's fill-flash mode if it has one.
sentences.chinese: 在阴天，如果相机有充分闪光模式，则可使用该模式。

sentences.english: Excuse me, professor. But I get to ask. How can solar energy work at night or on cloudy days.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我想知道太阳能咋个在夜间或阴天使用。

sentences.english: We can see neither Altair or Ursa Major in the cloudy night sky.
sentences.chinese: 阴天的夜空既看不到牛郎星，也看不到北斗星。

sentences.english: Some were kept in cages lit constantly, so as to resemble a never-ending overcast day.
sentences.chinese: 一组关在有持续光照的笼子里来模拟持续的阴天。

sentences.english: However, on a cloudy day, looking around, one can only see boundless land disappearing into a sea of clouds.
sentences.chinese: 但遇阴天时，环顾四周，苍茫大地，尽入云海。

sentences.english: It was cloudy this morning, but it turned out fine.
sentences.chinese: 今天早晨阴天，可结果是个好天。

sentences.english: A succession of dull days damps down the spirits.
sentences.chinese: 连续数日的阴天会让人情绪低落。

sentences.english: But unfortunately, it was a cloudy and windy day.
sentences.chinese: 但天公不作美，清晨时阴天，而且刮起大风。

sentences.english: Han seemed to redden slightly, like the sun suddenly showing through on a cloudy day .
sentences.chinese: 韩学愈似乎脸色微红，像阴天忽透太阳。

sentences.english: Doesn’t it seem as though there are a bit too many overcast daysand nights?
sentences.chinese: 我们的阴天和黑夜是否稍微太多了一些？

sentences.english: A misty morning does not signify a cloudy day.
sentences.chinese: 有雾的早晨并不代表就是阴天。

sentences.english: It also recharged to some extent on cloudy days.
sentences.chinese: 另外，它有时候也可以在阴天使用。

sentences.english: “Happiness does not come from wanting to be somewhere else, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: “想去某个地方逃避阴天并不会产生幸福感，”他说。

sentences.english: Its transpiration rate (Tr) in fine day is clearly higher than that in overcast day.
sentences.chinese: 栓皮栎叶片晴天的蒸腾速率明显高于阴天。

sentences.english: The pigeons' magnetic sense seemed to be affected on cloudy days.
sentences.chinese: 鸽子的磁感似乎在阴天受到了影响。

sentences.english: Peter takes a chance by not brining an umbrella in a cloudy day.
sentences.chinese: 彼得赌说今天阴天但是不会下雨，所以他不带伞出门。

definition: Xiaoxue or Lesser Snow, 20th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 22nd November-6th December
